custom_values.value: You are competing against several other [[type]] managers within [[reference to the organization]] and all [[type]] managers will be evaluated based on the share of [[second reference to the business activity]] that are successful.
You have full authority to make all the critical choices related to [[reference to the business activity]].
You are very familiar with [[reference to the business activity]] and have several years of experience in the field.
For each [[reference to the business activity]], you will be personally and deeply involved in the execution.

template.situation: Suppose you are a [[type]] manager at [[organization]].
In your role, you supervise [[regular business activity under your supervision]].
template.prompt: What share of [[final reference to the business activity]] are typically successful in your industry when supervised by other [[type]] managers?

template.situation: Suppose you are a [[type]] manager at [[organization]].
They recently hired you to supervise [[regular business activity under your supervision]].
template.prompt: What share of [[final reference to the business activity]] do you expect to be successful under your supervision?
